spec_data.Name: perl-POE-Loop-Event
spec_data.Description:
POE::Loop::Event implements the interface documented in POE::Loop.
Therefore it has no documentation of its own. Please see POE::Loop for
more details.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:54:53 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Bridge that allows POE to be driven by Event.pm
